description: Do newer breweries brew more standard 12 oz beers. Surpringly strong association to me. Alcohol and hops are very correlated. Alcohol and bottle size are correlated. Apparent negative correlation between brewery_id and ounces. Non ASCII chars in names4. An exploration of beer names1. Brewery names by wordcount letter3. Brewery_id and letter_count seem correlated. There are only two one word Breweries The one word breweries Histogram of number of words in brewery names Some interesting Correlations 1. Much weaker ibu ounces correlation than abv. Technically a unicode Right single quotation mark xe2 x80 x99 was used in place of apostrophes 15 times. The Degree symobol was used in three beer names. Look for longest and shortest beer names2. Do newer breweries pick longer names 4. xe2 x80 x98 Havanüther is not an actual dictionary word. Most of the umlauts ö were Kölsch related. Left single quoatation mark used once. How many single word breweries 5.
